      • validateHTTP_URI

        public static boolean validateHTTP_URI(java.lang.String uri)

      • redirectTo

        @RequestMapping(value="/{id:(?!link|index).*}",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView redirectTo(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Given a shortened url redirects the user to the original url

        This method checks using Google Safe Browsing if original url is save. If it is, redirects the user. If it is not, redirects to a page that informs the using about the danger. If an error occurs, it returns a page showing the specific error.

        Parameters:
        id - shortened url provided
        request - HttpServletRequest request
        Returns:
        ModelAndView containing redirection page or error

      • shortener

        @RequestMapping(value="/link",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ShortURL> shortener(@RequestParam(value="url",required=true)
                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String url,
                                                                                                                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Shorts the url provided

        Checks if the provided url is reachable, if it is, returns the shortened url to the user. If it is not, informs the user about it so he/she can confirm that wants to shorten the url. It also checks if url is safe using Google Safe Browsing. If an error occurs, it returns a page showing the specific error.

        Parameters:
        url - link that is going to be shortened
        request - HttpServletRequest request
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity containing ShortUrl object

      • shortenerConfirm

        @RequestMapping(value="/linkConfirm",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ShortURL> shortenerConfirm(@RequestParam(value="url")
                                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String url,
                                                                                                                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Shortens a url, despite it is reachable or not.
        Parameters:
        url - link that is going to be shortened
        request - HttpServletRequest request
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity containing ShortUrl object

      • linkStats

        @PostMapping(value="/linkStats")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView linkStats(@RequestParam(value="shortenedUrl")
                                                                                               java.lang.String shortenedUrl,
                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="code")
                                                                                               java.lang.String code)
                                                                                        throws java.lang.Throwable
        Returns the user statistics about provided shortened url
        Parameters:
        shortenedUrl - shortened url which stats are going to be returned
        code - access code for the shortened url
        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • qr

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/qr",
                method=GET,
                produces="image/png")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<byte[]> qr(@RequestParam(value="link")
                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String link)
        Transforms a url into a QR image
        Parameters:
        link - shortened url to be transformed to qr
        Returns:
        response entity containing qr image as byte stream
